name: Battle Mythology - UE4 Remake
description:
This is remake of the game Battle Mythology what I created first on OpenFrameworks with C++.
In this project I using the power of Blueprints of UE4 to create the game, the 3D models I have is of the previous project.
Here you controlling one litle young boy and your sword of stone, your objective is kill the of lions as much as you can, but beware the lions, they want to kill you too.
